name: Unin's Delivery Adventures
description:
A short game with two different endings that follows Unin, a fungal spirit, as she runs errands for dyads.

Useful instructions: 

This game relies on clicking on things with your mouse. 

In scenes with Unin in them, you can usually click on her to progress. 

In the maze scene, you can progress by clicking and dragging Unin through the maze. 

When you come to either end screen of the game you must refresh the browser window to play again.

Hints: To end the game click the end game icon when it appears.

Clicking on lunches transports you back into the maze with the lunch in your inventory.

You can only deliver one lunch at a time.

Endings are determined by whether or not you collect energy for yourself.
